story: Once upon a time, in The Vale of Arryn there was a procurer whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Lady from the House Targaryen. It was sunrise in Red Keep when Arya Stark threatened the  castle of Cersei Lannister . Cersei Lannister was scared of the teleportation power of Arya Stark and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in Kings Landing when Cersei Lannister met Tommen Baratheon .  From Tommen Baratheon Cersei Lannister learnt the power of fire Resistance. It was the first day of Spring when Cersei Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to White Harbor.  Cersei Lannister met Shae. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Eddard Stark. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was Christmas in The Ruby Ford when  Cersei Lannister faced Arya Stark. Cersei Lannister used the power of fire Resistance , but Arya Stark used pausing Time. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Cersei Lannister finally saved freedom. Soon after Arya Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Cersei Lannister. It was the first day of Spring in The Twins,  when our hero met Arya Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Cersei Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was Easter day in Red Keep when Cersei Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Shae by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, in Karhold there was a bureaucrat whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Arryn. It was sunrise in Kings Landing when Robert Baratheon threatened the  freedom of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the invisibility power of Robert Baratheon and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in The Dreadfort when Bran Stark met Rickard Stark .  From Rickard Stark Bran Stark learnt the power of night Vision. It was the Winter Solstice when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Torrhen's Square.  Bran Stark met Robb Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Gendry. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was sunrise in The Twins when  Bran Stark faced Robert Baratheon. Bran Stark used the power of mind Reading , but Robert Baratheon used mind Reading. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved equality. Soon after Robert Baratheon was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was sunrise in Castle Black,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in Deepwood Motte when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Robb Stark by throwing a ball.

story: Once upon a time, in Raventree Hall there was a murderer whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a King from the House Tyrell. It was the Winter Solstice in Kings Landing when Margaery Tyrell threatened the  equality of Jon Snow . Jon Snow was scared of the night Vision power of Margaery Tyrell and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in Bear Island when Jon Snow met Khal Drogo .  From Khal Drogo Jon Snow learnt the power of erasing Memory. It was the Summer Solstice when Jon Snow finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Whispering Wood.  Jon Snow met Aerys II Targaryen. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Mace Tyrell. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Easter day in The Ruby Ford when  Jon Snow faced Margaery Tyrell. Jon Snow used the power of night Vision , but Margaery Tyrell used invisibility. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Jon Snow finally saved freedom. Soon after Margaery Tyrell was hungry for revenge and chased down Jon Snow. It was the Middle Of the Night in Great Sept of Baelor,  when our hero met Margaery Tyrell again, and they fought in the final battle. Jon Snow won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Autumnal Equinox in Torrhen's Square when Jon Snow was finally safe, and celebrated with Aerys II Targaryen by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, in Crossroads Inn there was a murderer whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a King from the House Lannister. It was Easter day in Torrhen's Square when Tyrion Lannister threatened the  equality of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the slowing Time power of Tyrion Lannister and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in Karhold when Bran Stark met Khal Drogo .  From Khal Drogo Bran Stark learnt the power of slowing Time. It was the first day of Spring when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Moat Cailin.  Bran Stark met Robb Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Shae. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Summer Solstice in The Whispering Wood when  Bran Stark faced Tyrion Lannister. Bran Stark used the power of teleportation , but Tyrion Lannister used slowing Time. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved happiness. Soon after Tyrion Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was the first day of Spring in Karhold,  when our hero met Tyrion Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Winter Solstice in Saltpans when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Robb Stark by throwing a ball.

story: Once upon a time, in The Ruby Ford there was a bureaucrat whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Queen  from the House Baratheon. It was the Summer Solstice in Kings Landing when Jon Snow threatened the  peace of Arya Stark . Arya Stark was scared of the slowing Time power of Jon Snow and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Iron Island when Arya Stark met Aegon Targaryen .  From Aegon Targaryen Arya Stark learnt the power of night Vision. It was the first day of Spring when Arya Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Crossroads Inn.  Arya Stark met Eddard Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Rhaegar Targaryen. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the first day of Spring in The Dreadfort when  Arya Stark faced Jon Snow. Arya Stark used the power of invisibility , but Jon Snow used fire Resistance. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Arya Stark finally saved equality. Soon after Jon Snow was hungry for revenge and chased down Arya Stark. It was the Middle Of the Night in Saltpans,  when our hero met Jon Snow again, and they fought in the final battle. Arya Stark won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Winter Solstice in The Eyrie when Arya Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Eddard Stark by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in Moat Cailin there was a bureaucrat whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. It was the Summer Solstice in Kings Landing when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the  freedom of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the night Vision power of Daenerys Targaryen and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in Moat Cailin when Tyrion Lannister met Euron Greyjoy .  From Euron Greyjoy Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of night Vision. It was Christmas when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Raventree Hall.  Tyrion Lannister met Jaime Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Aerys II Targaryen. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the first day of Spring in Bear Island when  Tyrion Lannister faced Daenerys Targaryen. Tyrion Lannister used the power of erasing Memory , but Daenerys Targaryen used teleportation. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved Title. Soon after Daenerys Targaryen was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Crossroads Inn,  when our hero met Daenerys Targaryen again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in Winterfell when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Jaime Lannister by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, in Karhold there was a bureaucrat whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Lady from the House Stark. It was Christmas in The Twins when Cersei Lannister threatened the  happiness of Margaery Tyrell . Margaery Tyrell was scared of the teleportation power of Cersei Lannister and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in Saltpans when Margaery Tyrell met Joffrey Baratheon .  From Joffrey Baratheon Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of mind Reading. It was Christmas when Margaery Tyrell finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Karhold.  Margaery Tyrell met Mace Tyrell. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Joanna Lannister. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the first day of Spring in The Eyrie when  Margaery Tyrell faced Cersei Lannister. Margaery Tyrell used the power of slowing Time , but Cersei Lannister used invisibility. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Margaery Tyrell finally saved jewel. Soon after Cersei Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Margaery Tyrell. It was the Winter Solstice in The Vale of Arryn,  when our hero met Cersei Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Margaery Tyrell won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Middle Of the Night in Deepwood Motte when Margaery Tyrell was finally safe, and celebrated with Mace Tyrell by throwing a ball.

story: Once upon a time, in Torrhen's Square there was a rebel whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Martell. It was sunrise in The Trident when Jon Snow threatened the  Title of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the invisibility power of Jon Snow and refused to fight back. It was Easter day in Winterfell when Tyrion Lannister met Shae .  From Shae Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of night Vision. It was Christmas when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Kings Landing.  Tyrion Lannister met Lancel Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Rickard Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Easter day in Crossroads Inn when  Tyrion Lannister faced Jon Snow. Tyrion Lannister used the power of fire Resistance , but Jon Snow used pausing Time. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved House. Soon after Jon Snow was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was the first day of Spring in The Twins,  when our hero met Jon Snow again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was Easter day in Karhold when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Lancel Lannister by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, in Great Sept of Baelor there was a murderer whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a King from the House Martell. It was the Middle Of the Night in Torrhen's Square when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the  lifestyle of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the pausing Time power of Daenerys Targaryen and refused to fight back. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Moat Cailin when Tyrion Lannister met Cassana Baratheon .  From Cassana Baratheon Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of night Vision. It was the Winter Solstice when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Castle Black.  Tyrion Lannister met Jaime Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Daario Naharis. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Easter day in The Ruby Ford when  Tyrion Lannister faced Daenerys Targaryen. Tyrion Lannister used the power of erasing Memory , but Daenerys Targaryen used pausing Time. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved freedom. Soon after Daenerys Targaryen was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was Christmas in The Ruby Ford,  when our hero met Daenerys Targaryen again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in Red Keep when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Jaime Lannister by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, in Seagard there was a revolutionary whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a King from the House Martell. It was the Summer Solstice in Oldstones when Bran Stark threatened the  peace of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the fire Resistance power of Bran Stark and refused to fight back. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Crossroads Inn when Tyrion Lannister met Cersei Lannister .  From Cersei Lannister Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of pausing Time. It was the first day of Spring when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Seagard.  Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Catelyn Stark. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Winter Solstice in The Vale of Arryn when  Tyrion Lannister faced Bran Stark. Tyrion Lannister used the power of night Vision , but Bran Stark used fire Resistance. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved freedom. Soon after Bran Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was the first day of Spring in The Whispering Wood,  when our hero met Bran Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in Winterfell when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Joanna Lannister by  having a feast.

It was sunrise in Bear Island when Arya Stark threatened the  castle of Robert Baratheon . Robert Baratheon was scared of the invisibility power of Arya Stark and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in Red Keep when Robert Baratheon met Joffrey Baratheon .  From Joffrey Baratheon Robert Baratheon learnt the power of gravity Control. It was the Summer Solstice when Robert Baratheon finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Oldstones.  Robert Baratheon met Edric Storm. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Bran Stark. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Autumnal Equinox in The Ruby Ford when  Robert Baratheon faced Arya Stark. Robert Baratheon used the power of slowing Time , but Arya Stark used night Vision. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Robert Baratheon finally saved lifestyle. Soon after Arya Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Robert Baratheon. It was sunrise in Karhold,  when our hero met Arya Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Robert Baratheon won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in The Twins when Robert Baratheon was finally safe, and celebrated with Edric Storm by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, in Winterfell there was a squire whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a King from the House Baratheon. It was the Autumnal Equinox in White Harbor when Margaery Tyrell threatened the  peace of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the pausing Time power of Margaery Tyrell and refused to fight back. It was Easter day in Red Keep when Tyrion Lannister met Sansa Stark .  From Sansa Stark Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of mind Reading. It was Easter day when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Red Keep.  Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Willas Tyrell. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was Easter day in Riverlands when  Tyrion Lannister faced Margaery Tyrell. Tyrion Lannister used the power of erasing Memory , but Margaery Tyrell used pausing Time. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved peace. Soon after Margaery Tyrell was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was the Summer Solstice in Bear Island,  when our hero met Margaery Tyrell again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in The Vale of Arryn when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Joanna Lannister by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in The Whispering Wood there was a prophet whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Arryn. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Great Sept of Baelor when Margaery Tyrell threatened the  treasure of Daenerys Targaryen . Daenerys Targaryen was scared of the pausing Time power of Margaery Tyrell and refused to fight back. It was the Winter Solstice in Crossroads Inn when Daenerys Targaryen met Myrcella Baratheon .  From Myrcella Baratheon Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of slowing Time. It was the Middle Of the Night when Daenerys Targaryen finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Winterfell.  Daenerys Targaryen met Khal Drogo. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Tommen Baratheon. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Autumnal Equinox in The Whispering Wood when  Daenerys Targaryen faced Margaery Tyrell. Daenerys Targaryen used the power of invisibility , but Margaery Tyrell used fire Resistance. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Daenerys Targaryen finally saved treasure. Soon after Margaery Tyrell was hungry for revenge and chased down Daenerys Targaryen. It was the Winter Solstice in Riverlands,  when our hero met Margaery Tyrell again, and they fought in the final battle. Daenerys Targaryen won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in The Trident when Daenerys Targaryen was finally safe, and celebrated with Khal Drogo by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in Deepwood Motte there was a vigilante whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a King from the House Stark. It was the Winter Solstice in Red Keep when Cersei Lannister threatened the  House of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the teleportation power of Cersei Lannister and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in The Ruby Ford when Bran Stark met Robert Arryn .  From Robert Arryn Bran Stark learnt the power of mind Reading. It was the Summer Solstice when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Bear Island.  Bran Stark met Robb Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Tywin Lannister. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Summer Solstice in Raventree Hall when  Bran Stark faced Cersei Lannister. Bran Stark used the power of gravity Control , but Cersei Lannister used night Vision. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved castle. Soon after Cersei Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was the Summer Solstice in Castle Black,  when our hero met Cersei Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in The Eyrie when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Robb Stark by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in Kings Landing there was a warrior whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Martell. It was the Summer Solstice in Saltpans when Bran Stark threatened the  House of Daenerys Targaryen . Daenerys Targaryen was scared of the fire Resistance power of Bran Stark and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in Torrhen's Square when Daenerys Targaryen met Rhaegar Targaryen .  From Rhaegar Targaryen Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of night Vision. It was the Winter Solstice when Daenerys Targaryen finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Torrhen's Square.  Daenerys Targaryen met Ygritte. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Sansa Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Summer Solstice in Crossroads Inn when  Daenerys Targaryen faced Bran Stark. Daenerys Targaryen used the power of night Vision , but Bran Stark used invisibility. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Daenerys Targaryen finally saved happiness. Soon after Bran Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Daenerys Targaryen. It was the Winter Solstice in Karhold,  when our hero met Bran Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Daenerys Targaryen won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Autumnal Equinox in Raventree Hall when Daenerys Targaryen was finally safe, and celebrated with Ygritte by playing a game.

It was sunrise in Deepwood Motte when Petyr Baelish threatened the  jewel of Jon Snow . Jon Snow was scared of the teleportation power of Petyr Baelish and refused to fight back. It was Easter day in Seagard when Jon Snow met Daario Naharis .  From Daario Naharis Jon Snow learnt the power of teleportation. It was Christmas when Jon Snow finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Crossroads Inn.  Jon Snow met Daario Naharis. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Lysa Arryn. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Summer Solstice in Saltpans when  Jon Snow faced Petyr Baelish. Jon Snow used the power of invisibility , but Petyr Baelish used invisibility. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Jon Snow finally saved freedom. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Jon Snow. It was the Winter Solstice in Crossroads Inn,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Jon Snow won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was Christmas in Moat Cailin when Jon Snow was finally safe, and celebrated with Daario Naharis by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in Kings Landing there was a regent whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Tyrell. It was Easter day in Raventree Hall when Petyr Baelish threatened the  happiness of Daenerys Targaryen . Daenerys Targaryen was scared of the teleportation power of Petyr Baelish and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in The Twins when Daenerys Targaryen met Aerys II Targaryen .  From Aerys II Targaryen Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of slowing Time. It was the Middle Of the Night when Daenerys Targaryen finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Saltpans.  Daenerys Targaryen met Hizdahr zo Loraq. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Lysa Arryn. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Winter Solstice in Red Keep when  Daenerys Targaryen faced Petyr Baelish. Daenerys Targaryen used the power of erasing Memory , but Petyr Baelish used teleportation. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Daenerys Targaryen finally saved freedom. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Daenerys Targaryen. It was sunrise in The Twins,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Daenerys Targaryen won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in Bear Island when Daenerys Targaryen was finally safe, and celebrated with Hizdahr zo Loraq by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, in Great Sept of Baelor there was a official whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Queen  from the House Stark. It was Christmas in Bear Island when Bran Stark threatened the  jewel of Cersei Lannister . Cersei Lannister was scared of the night Vision power of Bran Stark and refused to fight back. It was the Winter Solstice in The Trident when Cersei Lannister met Daario Naharis .  From Daario Naharis Cersei Lannister learnt the power of pausing Time. It was Easter day when Cersei Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Red Keep.  Cersei Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Catelyn Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was sunrise in The Ruby Ford when  Cersei Lannister faced Bran Stark. Cersei Lannister used the power of gravity Control , but Bran Stark used erasing Memory. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Cersei Lannister finally saved peace. Soon after Bran Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Cersei Lannister. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Ruby Ford,  when our hero met Bran Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Cersei Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Winter Solstice in Karhold when Cersei Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Myrcella Baratheon by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, in Bear Island there was a advisor whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Tyrell. It was the Autumnal Equinox in The Vale of Arryn when Arya Stark threatened the  Title of Jon Snow . Jon Snow was scared of the teleportation power of Arya Stark and refused to fight back. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Seagard when Jon Snow met Khal Drogo .  From Khal Drogo Jon Snow learnt the power of slowing Time. It was Easter day when Jon Snow finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Twins.  Jon Snow met Aegon Targaryen. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Sansa Stark. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the first day of Spring in Torrhen's Square when  Jon Snow faced Arya Stark. Jon Snow used the power of teleportation , but Arya Stark used mind Reading. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Jon Snow finally saved lifestyle. Soon after Arya Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Jon Snow. It was the Summer Solstice in Moat Cailin,  when our hero met Arya Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Jon Snow won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in The Whispering Wood when Jon Snow was finally safe, and celebrated with Aegon Targaryen by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, in The Ruby Ford there was a revolutionary whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a King from the House Lannister. It was the Winter Solstice in Riverlands when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the  lifestyle of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the gravity Control power of Daenerys Targaryen and refused to fight back. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Oldstones when Bran Stark met Joanna Lannister .  From Joanna Lannister Bran Stark learnt the power of night Vision. It was the Summer Solstice when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Trident.  Bran Stark met Robb Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Khal Drogo. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Middle Of the Night in Seagard when  Bran Stark faced Daenerys Targaryen. Bran Stark used the power of night Vision , but Daenerys Targaryen used slowing Time. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved castle. Soon after Daenerys Targaryen was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Red Keep,  when our hero met Daenerys Targaryen again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was Easter day in White Harbor when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Robb Stark by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, in Torrhen's Square there was a rebel whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Queen  from the House Targaryen. It was sunrise in The Whispering Wood when Robert Baratheon threatened the  jewel of Cersei Lannister . Cersei Lannister was scared of the pausing Time power of Robert Baratheon and refused to fight back. It was Easter day in Crossroads Inn when Cersei Lannister met Lysa Arryn .  From Lysa Arryn Cersei Lannister learnt the power of pausing Time. It was the first day of Spring when Cersei Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Bear Island.  Cersei Lannister met Shae. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Edric Storm. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Vale of Arryn when  Cersei Lannister faced Robert Baratheon. Cersei Lannister used the power of gravity Control , but Robert Baratheon used pausing Time. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Cersei Lannister finally saved treasure. Soon after Robert Baratheon was hungry for revenge and chased down Cersei Lannister. It was Easter day in Riverlands,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Cersei Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in Torrhen's Square when Cersei Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Shae by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, in The Whispering Wood there was a bureaucrat whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a King from the House Arryn. It was sunrise in Winterfell when Cersei Lannister threatened the  peace of Jon Snow . Jon Snow was scared of the pausing Time power of Cersei Lannister and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in The Eyrie when Jon Snow met Edric Storm .  From Edric Storm Jon Snow learnt the power of slowing Time. It was Christmas when Jon Snow finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Whispering Wood.  Jon Snow met Rhaegar Targaryen. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Tywin Lannister. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Christmas in White Harbor when  Jon Snow faced Cersei Lannister. Jon Snow used the power of gravity Control , but Cersei Lannister used pausing Time. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Jon Snow finally saved equality. Soon after Cersei Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Jon Snow. It was the Winter Solstice in Moat Cailin,  when our hero met Cersei Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Jon Snow won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in Winterfell when Jon Snow was finally safe, and celebrated with Rhaegar Targaryen by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, in Moat Cailin there was a squire whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Lady from the House Martell. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Ruby Ford when Cersei Lannister threatened the  happiness of Daenerys Targaryen . Daenerys Targaryen was scared of the slowing Time power of Cersei Lannister and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in Castle Black when Daenerys Targaryen met Tommen Baratheon .  From Tommen Baratheon Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of invisibility. It was the first day of Spring when Daenerys Targaryen finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Seagard.  Daenerys Targaryen met Lyarra Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Lancel Lannister. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the first day of Spring in Raventree Hall when  Daenerys Targaryen faced Cersei Lannister. Daenerys Targaryen used the power of pausing Time , but Cersei Lannister used erasing Memory. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Daenerys Targaryen finally saved Title. Soon after Cersei Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Daenerys Targaryen. It was the Winter Solstice in Red Keep,  when our hero met Cersei Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Daenerys Targaryen won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Autumnal Equinox in Raventree Hall when Daenerys Targaryen was finally safe, and celebrated with Lyarra Stark by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, in Oldstones there was a advisor whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Stark. It was sunrise in The Eyrie when Jon Snow threatened the  treasure of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the invisibility power of Jon Snow and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in The Twins when Tyrion Lannister met Rhaella Targaryen .  From Rhaella Targaryen Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of erasing Memory. It was the Middle Of the Night when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Whispering Wood.  Tyrion Lannister met Lancel Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Lyarra Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Summer Solstice in Deepwood Motte when  Tyrion Lannister faced Jon Snow. Tyrion Lannister used the power of teleportation , but Jon Snow used fire Resistance. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved jewel. Soon after Jon Snow was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was sunrise in The Eyrie,  when our hero met Jon Snow again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in Raventree Hall when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Lancel Lannister by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, in The Dreadfort there was a revolutionary whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a King from the House Tyrell. It was the first day of Spring in The Twins when Robert Baratheon threatened the  castle of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the night Vision power of Robert Baratheon and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in Kings Landing when Tyrion Lannister met Margaery Tyrell .  From Margaery Tyrell Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of invisibility. It was sunrise when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Whispering Wood.  Tyrion Lannister met Shae. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Steffon Baratheon. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Summer Solstice in White Harbor when  Tyrion Lannister faced Robert Baratheon. Tyrion Lannister used the power of erasing Memory , but Robert Baratheon used invisibility. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved castle. Soon after Robert Baratheon was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was Christmas in Karhold,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in The Trident when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Shae by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, in Riverlands there was a prophet whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Targaryen. It was Christmas in The Eyrie when Tyrion Lannister threatened the  House of Jon Snow . Jon Snow was scared of the teleportation power of Tyrion Lannister and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in Red Keep when Jon Snow met Petyr Baelish .  From Petyr Baelish Jon Snow learnt the power of pausing Time. It was the Summer Solstice when Jon Snow finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Red Keep.  Jon Snow met Ygritte. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Lancel Lannister. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was sunrise in Deepwood Motte when  Jon Snow faced Tyrion Lannister. Jon Snow used the power of erasing Memory , but Tyrion Lannister used erasing Memory. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Jon Snow finally saved House. Soon after Tyrion Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Jon Snow. It was sunrise in The Dreadfort,  when our hero met Tyrion Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Jon Snow won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was Christmas in Seagard when Jon Snow was finally safe, and celebrated with Ygritte by throwing a ball.

story: Once upon a time, in The Iron Island there was a vigilante whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen  from the House Tyrell. It was the Winter Solstice in Torrhen's Square when Petyr Baelish threatened the  House of Margaery Tyrell . Margaery Tyrell was scared of the fire Resistance power of Petyr Baelish and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in Crossroads Inn when Margaery Tyrell met Arya Stark .  From Arya Stark Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of invisibility. It was Easter day when Margaery Tyrell finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Deepwood Motte.  Margaery Tyrell met Loras Tyrell. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Robert Arryn. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Easter day in The Whispering Wood when  Margaery Tyrell faced Petyr Baelish. Margaery Tyrell used the power of pausing Time , but Petyr Baelish used gravity Control. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Margaery Tyrell finally saved castle. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Margaery Tyrell. It was the Winter Solstice in Moat Cailin,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Margaery Tyrell won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Middle Of the Night in Kings Landing when Margaery Tyrell was finally safe, and celebrated with Loras Tyrell by throwing a ball.

story: Once upon a time, in The Twins there was a murderer whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Lady from the House Greyjoy. It was sunrise in Saltpans when Cersei Lannister threatened the  happiness of Daenerys Targaryen . Daenerys Targaryen was scared of the mind Reading power of Cersei Lannister and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in Castle Black when Daenerys Targaryen met Sansa Stark .  From Sansa Stark Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of slowing Time. It was Christmas when Daenerys Targaryen finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Deepwood Motte.  Daenerys Targaryen met Viserys Targaryen. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Shae. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the first day of Spring in Moat Cailin when  Daenerys Targaryen faced Cersei Lannister. Daenerys Targaryen used the power of teleportation , but Cersei Lannister used pausing Time. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Daenerys Targaryen finally saved happiness. Soon after Cersei Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Daenerys Targaryen. It was Easter day in Oldstones,  when our hero met Cersei Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Daenerys Targaryen won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was Easter day in Karhold when Daenerys Targaryen was finally safe, and celebrated with Viserys Targaryen by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, in The Twins there was a revolutionary whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a King from the House Martell. It was the Winter Solstice in Oldstones when Tyrion Lannister threatened the  castle of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the invisibility power of Tyrion Lannister and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in The Whispering Wood when Bran Stark met Rhaenys Targaryen .  From Rhaenys Targaryen Bran Stark learnt the power of teleportation. It was the Summer Solstice when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Whispering Wood.  Bran Stark met Eddard Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Cersei Lannister. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Winter Solstice in Seagard when  Bran Stark faced Tyrion Lannister. Bran Stark used the power of night Vision , but Tyrion Lannister used mind Reading. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved freedom. Soon after Tyrion Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was the Summer Solstice in Castle Black,  when our hero met Tyrion Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in Seagard when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Eddard Stark by throwing a ball.

story: Once upon a time, in Kings Landing there was a warrior whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a King from the House Greyjoy. It was the Winter Solstice in Karhold when Bran Stark threatened the  lifestyle of Petyr Baelish . Petyr Baelish was scared of the slowing Time power of Bran Stark and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Vale of Arryn when Petyr Baelish met Lyanna Stark .  From Lyanna Stark Petyr Baelish learnt the power of invisibility. It was the Middle Of the Night when Petyr Baelish finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Riverlands.  Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Catelyn Stark. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Eyrie when  Petyr Baelish faced Bran Stark. Petyr Baelish used the power of gravity Control , but Bran Stark used gravity Control. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Petyr Baelish finally saved House. Soon after Bran Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Petyr Baelish. It was the Middle Of the Night in Saltpans,  when our hero met Bran Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Petyr Baelish won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in Great Sept of Baelor when Petyr Baelish was finally safe, and celebrated with Robert Arryn by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in The Whispering Wood there was a soldier whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a King from the House Tyrell. It was the Winter Solstice in Torrhen's Square when Cersei Lannister threatened the  castle of Petyr Baelish . Petyr Baelish was scared of the pausing Time power of Cersei Lannister and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in Crossroads Inn when Petyr Baelish met Garlan Tyrell .  From Garlan Tyrell Petyr Baelish learnt the power of pausing Time. It was the first day of Spring when Petyr Baelish finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Trident.  Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Shae. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Christmas in Winterfell when  Petyr Baelish faced Cersei Lannister. Petyr Baelish used the power of gravity Control , but Cersei Lannister used gravity Control. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Petyr Baelish finally saved Title. Soon after Cersei Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Petyr Baelish. It was Easter day in Kings Landing,  when our hero met Cersei Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Petyr Baelish won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was Easter day in Bear Island when Petyr Baelish was finally safe, and celebrated with Robert Arryn by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, in Bear Island there was a advisor whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a King from the House Stark. It was Easter day in The Iron Island when Bran Stark threatened the  freedom of Petyr Baelish . Petyr Baelish was scared of the fire Resistance power of Bran Stark and refused to fight back. It was the Summer Solstice in The Iron Island when Petyr Baelish met Willas Tyrell .  From Willas Tyrell Petyr Baelish learnt the power of gravity Control. It was the Winter Solstice when Petyr Baelish finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Moat Cailin.  Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Rickon Stark. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was Easter day in Deepwood Motte when  Petyr Baelish faced Bran Stark. Petyr Baelish used the power of fire Resistance , but Bran Stark used mind Reading. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Petyr Baelish finally saved House. Soon after Bran Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Petyr Baelish. It was the first day of Spring in Oldstones,  when our hero met Bran Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Petyr Baelish won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was Christmas in The Whispering Wood when Petyr Baelish was finally safe, and celebrated with Lysa Arryn by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, in Riverlands there was a advisor whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a King from the House Tully. It was Christmas in Riverlands when Petyr Baelish threatened the  Title of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the slowing Time power of Petyr Baelish and refused to fight back. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Deepwood Motte when Bran Stark met Daario Naharis .  From Daario Naharis Bran Stark learnt the power of mind Reading. It was sunrise when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Whispering Wood.  Bran Stark met Robb Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Robert Arryn. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Middle Of the Night in Deepwood Motte when  Bran Stark faced Petyr Baelish. Bran Stark used the power of fire Resistance , but Petyr Baelish used slowing Time. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved peace. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was the Summer Solstice in Seagard,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was Christmas in Kings Landing when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Robb Stark by listening to a storytelling.

It was Christmas in Torrhen's Square when Tyrion Lannister threatened the  happiness of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the mind Reading power of Tyrion Lannister and refused to fight back. It was Easter day in White Harbor when Bran Stark met Euron Greyjoy .  From Euron Greyjoy Bran Stark learnt the power of mind Reading. It was the first day of Spring when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Trident.  Bran Stark met Arya Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Jaime Lannister. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Moat Cailin when  Bran Stark faced Tyrion Lannister. Bran Stark used the power of erasing Memory , but Tyrion Lannister used night Vision. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved lifestyle. Soon after Tyrion Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was the Winter Solstice in Winterfell,  when our hero met Tyrion Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in Raventree Hall when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Arya Stark by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, in Raventree Hall there was a assassin whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a King from the House Lannister. It was sunrise in The Whispering Wood when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the  freedom of Petyr Baelish . Petyr Baelish was scared of the invisibility power of Daenerys Targaryen and refused to fight back. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Crossroads Inn when Petyr Baelish met Viserys Targaryen .  From Viserys Targaryen Petyr Baelish learnt the power of invisibility. It was the first day of Spring when Petyr Baelish finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Torrhen's Square.  Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Aerys II Targaryen. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was Christmas in Red Keep when  Petyr Baelish faced Daenerys Targaryen. Petyr Baelish used the power of fire Resistance , but Daenerys Targaryen used mind Reading. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Petyr Baelish finally saved happiness. Soon after Daenerys Targaryen was hungry for revenge and chased down Petyr Baelish. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Moat Cailin,  when our hero met Daenerys Targaryen again, and they fought in the final battle. Petyr Baelish won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in Seagard when Petyr Baelish was finally safe, and celebrated with Lysa Arryn by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, in Red Keep there was a rebel whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Queen  from the House Martell. It was the Winter Solstice in Saltpans when Arya Stark threatened the  jewel of Daenerys Targaryen . Daenerys Targaryen was scared of the night Vision power of Arya Stark and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in Karhold when Daenerys Targaryen met Bran Stark .  From Bran Stark Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of gravity Control. It was Christmas when Daenerys Targaryen finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Castle Black.  Daenerys Targaryen met Jon Snow. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Bran Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was sunrise in Winterfell when  Daenerys Targaryen faced Arya Stark. Daenerys Targaryen used the power of fire Resistance , but Arya Stark used gravity Control. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Daenerys Targaryen finally saved equality. Soon after Arya Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Daenerys Targaryen. It was the Winter Solstice in Deepwood Motte,  when our hero met Arya Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Daenerys Targaryen won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in Deepwood Motte when Daenerys Targaryen was finally safe, and celebrated with Jon Snow by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, in Karhold there was a revolutionary whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Lannister. It was the Winter Solstice in The Whispering Wood when Tyrion Lannister threatened the  peace of Jon Snow . Jon Snow was scared of the night Vision power of Tyrion Lannister and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in Moat Cailin when Jon Snow met Rickard Stark .  From Rickard Stark Jon Snow learnt the power of fire Resistance. It was the first day of Spring when Jon Snow finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Castle Black.  Jon Snow met Rhaenys Targaryen. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Jaime Lannister. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Summer Solstice in Oldstones when  Jon Snow faced Tyrion Lannister. Jon Snow used the power of teleportation , but Tyrion Lannister used mind Reading. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Jon Snow finally saved equality. Soon after Tyrion Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Jon Snow. It was sunrise in Riverlands,  when our hero met Tyrion Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Jon Snow won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in The Twins when Jon Snow was finally safe, and celebrated with Rhaenys Targaryen by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, in Red Keep there was a regent whose name was Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was a King from the House Lannister. It was the Autumnal Equinox in White Harbor when Petyr Baelish threatened the  Title of Robert Baratheon . Robert Baratheon was scared of the invisibility power of Petyr Baelish and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in The Eyrie when Robert Baratheon met Myrcella Baratheon .  From Myrcella Baratheon Robert Baratheon learnt the power of night Vision. It was the Winter Solstice when Robert Baratheon finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Torrhen's Square.  Robert Baratheon met Cassana Baratheon. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Robert Arryn. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Middle Of the Night in Winterfell when  Robert Baratheon faced Petyr Baelish. Robert Baratheon used the power of gravity Control , but Petyr Baelish used invisibility. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Robert Baratheon finally saved Title. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Robert Baratheon. It was the Summer Solstice in The Eyrie,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Robert Baratheon won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in Great Sept of Baelor when Robert Baratheon was finally safe, and celebrated with Cassana Baratheon by watching a show.

story: Once upon a time, in Karhold there was a hunter whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Queen  from the House Lannister. It was the Middle Of the Night in Deepwood Motte when Margaery Tyrell threatened the  castle of Arya Stark . Arya Stark was scared of the night Vision power of Margaery Tyrell and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in Winterfell when Arya Stark met Stannis Baratheon .  From Stannis Baratheon Arya Stark learnt the power of mind Reading. It was the Autumnal Equinox when Arya Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Oldstones.  Arya Stark met Rickon Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Willas Tyrell. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Winter Solstice in The Dreadfort when  Arya Stark faced Margaery Tyrell. Arya Stark used the power of slowing Time , but Margaery Tyrell used pausing Time. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Arya Stark finally saved lifestyle. Soon after Margaery Tyrell was hungry for revenge and chased down Arya Stark. It was the Summer Solstice in The Dreadfort,  when our hero met Margaery Tyrell again, and they fought in the final battle. Arya Stark won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in White Harbor when Arya Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Rickon Stark by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, in The Eyrie there was a military leader whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a King from the House Lannister. It was the Winter Solstice in Great Sept of Baelor when Robert Baratheon threatened the  happiness of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the teleportation power of Robert Baratheon and refused to fight back. It was the Winter Solstice in The Whispering Wood when Tyrion Lannister met Arya Stark .  From Arya Stark Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of erasing Memory. It was sunrise when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Raventree Hall.  Tyrion Lannister met Tywin Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Renly Baratheon. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Summer Solstice in Crossroads Inn when  Tyrion Lannister faced Robert Baratheon. Tyrion Lannister used the power of teleportation , but Robert Baratheon used teleportation. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved castle. Soon after Robert Baratheon was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was the Middle Of the Night in White Harbor,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Autumnal Equinox in Bear Island when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Tywin Lannister by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, in Karhold there was a military leader whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a King from the House Targaryen. It was Christmas in White Harbor when Robert Baratheon threatened the  treasure of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the mind Reading power of Robert Baratheon and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in Raventree Hall when Tyrion Lannister met Shae .  From Shae Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of pausing Time. It was the first day of Spring when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Trident.  Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Gendry. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the first day of Spring in Karhold when  Tyrion Lannister faced Robert Baratheon. Tyrion Lannister used the power of erasing Memory , but Robert Baratheon used night Vision. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved equality. Soon after Robert Baratheon was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was the Summer Solstice in Crossroads Inn,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was Easter day in Riverlands when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Joanna Lannister by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, in Raventree Hall there was a prophet whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Queen  from the House Tyrell. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Saltpans when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the  treasure of Arya Stark . Arya Stark was scared of the slowing Time power of Daenerys Targaryen and refused to fight back. It was the Winter Solstice in Raventree Hall when Arya Stark met Daenerys Targaryen .  From Daenerys Targaryen Arya Stark learnt the power of fire Resistance. It was the Autumnal Equinox when Arya Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Torrhen's Square.  Arya Stark met Eddard Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Benjen Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the first day of Spring in The Trident when  Arya Stark faced Daenerys Targaryen. Arya Stark used the power of slowing Time , but Daenerys Targaryen used pausing Time. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Arya Stark finally saved freedom. Soon after Daenerys Targaryen was hungry for revenge and chased down Arya Stark. It was the Winter Solstice in Oldstones,  when our hero met Daenerys Targaryen again, and they fought in the final battle. Arya Stark won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in Winterfell when Arya Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Eddard Stark by getting married.

It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Saltpans when  Margaery Tyrell faced Petyr Baelish. Margaery Tyrell used the power of gravity Control , but Petyr Baelish used invisibility. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Margaery Tyrell finally saved peace. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Margaery Tyrell. It was the first day of Spring in Oldstones,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Margaery Tyrell won the duel and took the life of the villain. story: Once upon a time, in Kings Landing there was a spy whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a King from the House Arryn. It was the Winter Solstice in Riverlands when Margaery Tyrell threatened the  Title of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the slowing Time power of Margaery Tyrell and refused to fight back. It was the Summer Solstice in Crossroads Inn when Tyrion Lannister met Edric Storm .  From Edric Storm Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of fire Resistance. It was the first day of Spring when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Crossroads Inn.  Tyrion Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Garlan Tyrell. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Karhold when  Tyrion Lannister faced Margaery Tyrell. Tyrion Lannister used the power of slowing Time , but Margaery Tyrell used slowing Time. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved House. Soon after Margaery Tyrell was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was the Winter Solstice in The Whispering Wood,  when our hero met Margaery Tyrell again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was Christmas in Bear Island when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Myrcella Baratheon by throwing a ball.

story: Once upon a time, in Raventree Hall there was a hunter whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Tyrell. It was Easter day in The Ruby Ford when Margaery Tyrell threatened the  happiness of Arya Stark . Arya Stark was scared of the mind Reading power of Margaery Tyrell and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in Saltpans when Arya Stark met Cassana Baratheon .  From Cassana Baratheon Arya Stark learnt the power of erasing Memory. It was Easter day when Arya Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Whispering Wood.  Arya Stark met Eddard Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Alerie Tyrell. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the first day of Spring in Bear Island when  Arya Stark faced Margaery Tyrell. Arya Stark used the power of slowing Time , but Margaery Tyrell used mind Reading. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Arya Stark finally saved jewel. Soon after Margaery Tyrell was hungry for revenge and chased down Arya Stark. It was the Winter Solstice in Seagard,  when our hero met Margaery Tyrell again, and they fought in the final battle. Arya Stark won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Winter Solstice in Great Sept of Baelor when Arya Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Eddard Stark by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, in The Trident there was a revolutionary whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Greyjoy. It was the first day of Spring in Karhold when Robert Baratheon threatened the  equality of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the gravity Control power of Robert Baratheon and refused to fight back. It was the Winter Solstice in Riverlands when Bran Stark met Cassana Baratheon .  From Cassana Baratheon Bran Stark learnt the power of gravity Control. It was the Summer Solstice when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Vale of Arryn.  Bran Stark met Sansa Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Edric Storm. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Middle Of the Night in Great Sept of Baelor when  Bran Stark faced Robert Baratheon. Bran Stark used the power of invisibility , but Robert Baratheon used invisibility. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved jewel. Soon after Robert Baratheon was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was Easter day in Oldstones,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Autumnal Equinox in Red Keep when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Sansa Stark by playing a game.
